name: Ro Li
text: Wow I think I just had my best airport breakfast ever here. Sandwich was made to order and it came out hot, fresh and tasty. The egg in my sandwich was cracked and cooked in front of my eyes. It was Friday 6:30 am but it only took them 5 …More

name: Owen Braun
text: I visit this great spot  a lot! This is my favorite spot to have a bite.  I visit this spot regularly. The cooking is excellent, the crew is friendly and the prices are fair. I like meeting in this spot over a tasty meal.

name: James Bisson
text: Good quick lunch.  Airport prices.  Friendly service with clean tables.  Never enough seating when you want it but it’s like that everywhere.   The Stromboli was packed with meat and cheese and the Greek salad fresh and delicious.  Located top of the escalator entering A terminal.

name: Sidra Mahmood
text: Bought this pizza and two more slices for my husband since the pizza looked good but unfortunately, it might be artificial food coloring to give the illusion of a fresh pizza. Yuck! The dough is so chewy and it tastes stale. Perhaps the …More

name: Alex Goulet
text: Pizza was cold, not very tasty, and absurdly expensive (>$12 for two slices). Additionally, they do not accept personal cups to serve fountain drinks. The cashier was very dismissive of my concern for the vast amounts of toxic plastic waste …More

name: Rohan Harvey
text: The food is consistently fresh and yummy, employees gives fantastic service. I love how neat it is and vibes. Will visit here again.

name: Nicholas Martin
text: Wish I'd looked at the reviews ahead of time. They advertise "specials" on the board but don't actually have medium drinks so they charge more for the Large.  The guy literally said the board is different from what they actually do.  I'm guessing the franchise wouldn't agree with their practices.

name: Rich Ingleby
text: Super good customer service... Worker refused to add pepperoni to a slice of cheese because, “he was too busy” and “they don’t give him another worker.” Funny because he spent more time arguing with me about not being able to do it than …More

name: Mike .SA
text: Below average customer service, greasy not fresh pizza. Over priced and wants over $1 for a refill in a small drink. $10.99 for 2 fancy pizza slices but because I didn’t want two slices of just cheese or just pepperoni I had to pay extra for what I didn’t even get.

name: Rob Sharpstein
text: I was about to order and saw the server or pizza man bring out one tray of dough and a stack of pre-made crusts in a plastic bag. Come to find out that only the cheese and pepperoni pizzas are stretched as made. The others are pre-made …More

name: Thomas P
text: Manager is not friendly, the food is overpriced, even for a restaurant in an airport, and it cost $1.59 to refill your drink that they already fill with ice to the top. Overall, put me in a bad mood and I felt like I got cheated out of my money. Picture below to show you the size of a medium

name: Sam Ballard
text: For a pizza place they make a really good omelet!

name: David Canas
text: Middle eastern dude running the cashier and oven was pretty clearly annoyed at fact thst he had to serve me. …More

name: shawna Johnson
text: I Went to the ones at the Boston Logan international airport and the one in terminal A is good looks your eggs on the spot where as the one in terminal E has scrambled eggs pre-made. Sometimes to long where is green. I guess mix the eggs. I gave it a four because the service and all other food serviced.

name: Geoff Fitch
text: This location is inside terminal A of Logan airport. The slice of mushroom pizza was fresh, and pretty good, but a little on the bland side. No Pepsi or diet Pepsi, so I got a no-charge cup of water - which means I got an 8-ounce cup with 5 …More

name: Christian Giles
text: Might be acceptable pizza if you are hung over. Even then, a punch in the mouth is probably a better option. Choices are slim at the airport though so if you choose this pizza, pack some Dude Wipes for the plane.

name: Austin T
text: The attitude of the lady serving the food was the worst I have ever seen at a restaurant. She seemed very unhappy that you were there getting food. The Caesar salad was some iceberg lettuce and a few croutons.

name: Coach K
text: I was pleased with what I received. I will say that the pizza is waaay overpriced, however the slices I had we're rather delicious, I must say. The people working there, at the time were very nice. They were friendly, and quite accommodating. I  would definitely eat there again when I'm terminal a of Boston Logan!

name: Cait Fantegrossi
text: The food was decent but the guy who took my order was MISERABLE.

name: Brittany Harrison
text: The pizza was cold and old. Inedible. The service was painfully slow as well. Wish I would’ve eaten some chips from the vending machine instead.

name: Elizabeth Surcouf
text: Fiflthy. Associate was on phone and talking had to wait for him to acknowledge me. I ordered he noddedd back and kept talking.

name: sheryl
text: They didn't tell us they were out of what we actually ordered. When our food came we said, This is not what we ordered and were told, Oh ..we are out of the pan pizza and sausage panini so we gave you cheese thin slice and spinach …More

name: jvmusic 107
text: Great pizza, one of the best airport restaurants

name: Prakash Sridharan
text: Over prized pizzas and $1.49 for any refill. Food stale.

name: Tony Holeman
text: Really good for airport Italian food!

name: Pijus T
text: Good food for fair price in airport! Baked ziti + chicken = good meal

name: David Strunk
text: If you’re in the mood for bad pizza this is the place for you. Sbarro at Terminal A in the airport has everything: raw dough, greasy pools of yuck, and horrible customer service. If you’re the type of guy or gal who enjoys floppy slices …More

name: Monica S
text: Indian dude is so rude. Food is awful.

name: Timothy Kassis
text: They just heat up pre-baked food. Mine was still cold. Asked them to reheat it again and it was still barely warm. I knew I should have just went to the Burger King right next to it. Overall terrible food, even if you are a hungry traveler!

name: August Comding
text: Customer service is not friendly.  Food is over priced.

name: Fareeha Irfan
text:
I don't know about the food but the guy serving is so rude, I would never ever ever buy a single thing from this joint. The guy was just plain nasty!
I took 3 tissues and he yelled at me for that. No wonder it has a 2.7 rating and nobody buys food from him.

name: Joe Witt
text: The only place that opened on time, serving omlets made to order,  breakfast platters and sandwiches.

name: Qanit Takmeel
text:
The trick of eating a crow is to eat it while it is still hot.

Unfortunately, the same trick cannot be applied to Sbarro's pizza. Cold, stale, …More

name: Aaron Sewall
text: The western omelette was phenomenal!

name: Kiriza Bade
text: Good food, one foot long Strombo sandwich...Sbarro cares about customers: please inform us if anyone in your party has food allergies...cool.

name: Jeff Wallace
text: Food is quick and as good as you'll get in an airport. Employees are eh

name: K
text: Pretty good omlette, polite service, drinks a bit overpriced but this is the airport after all

name: Brad Anderson
text:
Slow, understaffed and confused. Average airport food.

Edit: just finished the"pizza", bad even for Sbarro.

name: Dakota Shanes
text: Service is terrible. Stromboli was fine

name: David Lamb
text: Pizza is over priced and unless you get a fresh one it's likely been out for awhile on the shelf and getting kind of rubbery, as far as airport food goes its kind of middle of the road though I guess.

name: Maria Restrepo
text: Worst pizza ever

name: Lnegro Chulo
text: Delicious

name: John Jericho
text: Man! I don't know but I don't like the place and not worth my money

name: Bernie Molaskey
text: Cold and unrecognizable sandwich. Could not eat.

name: Brandon Nesbitt
text: Old food sitting under heat lamp.

name: James Baird
text: Cold food kinda gross

name: Steven Emberson
text: Just don't

name: Ashish Vaid
text: Extremely rude man at the cash counter .Bad service and attitude.Passengers have no choice.

name: Eric Gallagher
text: Pizza is good, big piece

name: Taoufik Mimouni
text: Fast Italiano eats

name: Will Kennedy
text: Got the lemon chicken,  it is what you should expect.

name: Victor Zapata
text:
(Translated by Google) Very good service

(Original)
Muy buen servicio
